projects.title: Interactive Weather App
projects.summary: A beautiful, responsive weather application with real-time data, 5-day forecasts, geolocation support, and smooth animations. Features auto-background changes based on weather conditions.

projects.title: Weather Website (Previous)
projects.summary: A modern weather app that shows real-time weather and 5-day forecasts with animated effects and responsive design.

projects.title: Seat Availability Monitor
projects.summary: A real-time seat availability monitoring system using live JSON data, featuring a clean UI with auto-refresh functionality for tracking seat status.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.summary: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects and skills. Built with clean HTML, CSS, and JavaScript featuring smooth animations and professional design.
